TEXT.S: Congko China Itini i 35 00 N, 105 00 E, noAsiya ko China. Polong no sekalay i 9,596,960 sq km "saka 4 ko rayray no ngangan. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Xi Jinping, patirengan a romi'ad i 2012 a miheca saka 11 folad saka 15 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
